DataElement.preferredName: Biological Relative And HLA Typing Source Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of an individual's biological relative and HLA typing.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biological Relative And HLA Typing Source
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person related by descent rather than by marriage or law._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles._Where something is available or from where it originates.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The values that are permitted for the usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event. [Source: NCI]

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. PermissibleValues.value: Cord blood unit maternal HLA typing
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Umbilical Cord Blood Maternal HLA Typing

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Umbilical Cord Blood Maternal HLA Typing
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Blood present in the umbilical vessels at the time of delivery. If cryopreserved at birth, cord blood can serve as a source of hematopoietic progenitor cells for transplantation to a patient later diagnosed and treated for a hematopoietic disorder.: A designation that has some relationship to motherhood.: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

Concepts.definition: Blood present in the umbilical vessels at the time of delivery. If cryopreserved at birth, cord blood can serve as a source of hematopoietic progenitor cells for transplantation to a patient later diagnosed and treated for a hematopoietic disorder.
A designation that has some relationship to motherhood.
A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated definition of Umbilical Cord Blood to match current NCIt. 6.11.19 mc

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Recipient Biological Aunt Confirmation HLA Typing

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Recipient Biological Aunt Confirmation HLA Typing
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who gets something.: A female relative who is a sibling of either of the biological parents, and who share a common ancestor. (NCI): Having been established or verified.: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

Concepts.definition: A person who gets something.
A female relative who is a sibling of either of the biological parents, and who share a common ancestor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who gets something.: A person's brother or sister with whom they share a genetic makeup inherited from their shared biological parents.: Having been established or verified.: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

Concepts.definition: A person who gets something.
A person's brother or sister with whom they share a genetic makeup inherited from one or both of their shared biological parents.
Having been established or verified.
A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.
